synopsis.p: Process the documents with Stanford's CoreNLP.

description.p: tokenizes, POS-tags and lemmatizes each section using CoreNLP.
If ner is set then also performs Named Entity Recognition. Refer to CoreNLP NER for details on methods and Named Entity Types.
If parse is set, then parses the sentences and creates dependencies tuples in dependencyRelation.
If pretokenized is set, then will not create annotations for tokens and sentences. Thus the segmentation must be performed beforehand.

param-doc.name: lemmaFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to record the lemma.

param-doc.name: namedEntityLayer
param-doc.p: Layer where to create named entity annotations.

param-doc.name: namedEntityTypeFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to record the named entity type.

param-doc.name: pipelineProperties
param-doc.p: Additional properties to pass to CoreNLP pipeline. See the documentation of each pipeline annotator for available options.

param-doc.name: posFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to record the POS tag.

param-doc.name: pretokenized
param-doc.p: Do not perform tokenization and sentence splitting. Read tokens and sentences generated by previous steps.

param-doc.name: sentenceLayer
param-doc.p: Layer where to place (or read if pretokenized is set) sentence annotations.

param-doc.name: wordLayer
param-doc.p: Layer where to place (or read if pretokenized is set) tokens annotations.
